forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High around 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High around 50F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Evening rain followed by a mix of rain and snow overnight. Low 1C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Evening rain followed by a mix of rain and snow overnight. Low 34F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow tapering off in the morning. Decreasing cloudiness in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a mixture of rain and snow in the morning. Becoming partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 37F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 19F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High -2C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 28F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional snow showers later during the night. Low -6C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening followed by periods of snow showers after midnight. Low 21F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Moderating temperatures will change morning snow showers to rain showers by late day. High near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Moderating temperatures will change morning snow showers to rain showers by late day. High 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies later at night. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 43F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
